verses.verse: Now Moses <S%H4872><s%> kept <S%H7462><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Jethro <S%H3503><s%> his father <S%H2859><s%> in law, <S%H2859><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> of Midian: <S%H4080><s%> and he led <S%H5090><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> to the backside <S%H310><s%> of the desert, <S%H4057><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> even to Horeb. <S%H2722><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to him in a flame <S%H3827><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of a bush: <S%H5572><s%> and he looked, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the bush <S%H5572><s%> burned <S%H1197><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> and the bush <S%H5572><s%> was not consumed. <S%H398><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I will now <S%H4994><s%> turn <S%H5493><s%> aside, and see <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> sight, <S%H4758><s%> why <S%H4069><s%> the bush <S%H5572><s%> is not burnt. <S%H1197><s%>

And when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that he turned <S%H5493><s%> aside to see, <S%H7200><s%> God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to him out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the bush, <S%H5572><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Here <S%H2009><s%> am I.

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Draw not near <S%H7126><s%> here: <S%H1988><s%> put <S%H5394><s%> off your shoes <S%H5275><s%> from off your feet, <S%H7272><s%> for the place <S%H4725><s%> where on <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> you stand <S%H5975><s%> is holy <S%H6944><s%> ground. <S%H127><s%>

Moreover he said, <S%H559><s%> I am the God <S%H430><s%> of your father, <S%H1><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%> And Moses <S%H4872><s%> hid <S%H5641><s%> his face; <S%H6440><s%> for he was afraid <S%H3372><s%> to look <S%H5027><s%> on God. <S%H430><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I have surely seen <S%H7200><s%> the affliction <S%H6040><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and have heard <S%H8085><s%> their cry <S%H6818><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of their taskmasters; <S%H5065><s%> for I know <S%H3045><s%> their sorrows; <S%H4341><s%>

And I am come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and to bring <S%H5927><s%> them up out of that land <S%H776><s%> to a good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> and a large, <S%H7342><s%> to a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey; <S%H1706><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and the Perizzites, <S%H6522><s%> and the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusites. <S%H2983><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the cry <S%H6818><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> to me: and I have also <S%H1571><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> the oppression <S%H3906><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> oppress <S%H3905><s%> them.

Come <S%H3212><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, and I will send <S%H7971><s%> you to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> that you may bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> am I, that I should go <S%H3212><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and that I should bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt? <S%H4714><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Certainly <S%H3588><s%> I will be with you; and this <S%H2088><s%> shall be a token <S%H226><s%> to you, that I have sent <S%H7971><s%> you: When you have brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> God <S%H430><s%> on this <S%H2088><s%> mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> when I come <S%H935><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and shall say <S%H559><s%> to them, The God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to you; and they shall say <S%H559><s%> to me, What <S%H4100><s%> is his name? <S%H8034><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> shall I say <S%H559><s%> to them?

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> I AM <S%H1961><s%> THAT I AM: <S%H1961><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> shall you say <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> I AM <S%H1961><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to you.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> moreover <S%H5750><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Thus shall you say <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers, <S%H1><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to you: this <S%H2088><s%> is my name <S%H8034><s%> for ever, <S%H5769><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> is my memorial <S%H2143><s%> to all generations. <S%H1755><s%>

Go, <S%H3212><s%> and gather <S%H622><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> together, and say <S%H559><s%> to them, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers, <S%H1><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> of Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%> I have surely visited <S%H6485><s%> you, and seen that which <S%H834><s%> is done <S%H6213><s%> to you in Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

And I have said, <S%H559><s%> I will bring <S%H5927><s%> you up out of the affliction <S%H6040><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and the Perizzites, <S%H6522><s%> and the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusites, <S%H2983><s%> to a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>

And they shall listen <S%H8085><s%> to your voice: <S%H6963><s%> and you shall come, <S%H935><s%> you and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and you shall say <S%H559><s%> to him, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> has met <S%H7136><s%> with us: and now <S%H6258><s%> let us go, <S%H3212><s%> we beseech <S%H4994><s%> you, three <S%H7969><s%> days' <S%H3117><s%>journey <S%H1870><s%> into the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> that we may sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>
And I am sure <S%H3045><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will not let <S%H5414><s%> you go, <S%H1980><s%> no, <S%H3808><s%> not by a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And I will stretch <S%H7971><s%> out my hand, <S%H3027><s%> and smite <S%H5221><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> my wonders <S%H6381><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> thereof: and after <S%H310><s%> that he will let you go. <S%H7971><s%>

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Egyptians: <S%H4714><s%> and it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that, when you go, <S%H3212><s%> you shall not go <S%H3212><s%> empty. <S%H7387><s%>

But every woman <S%H802><s%> shall borrow <S%H7592><s%> of her neighbor, <S%H7934><s%> and of her that sojournes <S%H1481><s%> in her house, <S%H1004><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and raiment: <S%H8071><s%> and you shall put <S%H7760><s%> them on your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and on your daughters; <S%H1323><s%> and you shall spoil <S%H5337><s%> the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>
